com.ibm.util.merge

Class Template

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.util.merge.Template

  • public class Template
extends java.lang.Object
    A template and it's collection of directives. This class represents the primary interface for DragonFly.
    Author:
    Mike Storey
    See Also:
    Merge, merge(), packageOutput()

      • Template

        public Template(java.lang.String collection,
                java.lang.String column,
                java.lang.String name)
         throws DragonFlyException,
                DragonFlySqlException
        Template constructor that reads data from templateDB.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection Name
        column - Column Value
        name - Template Name
        Throws:
        DragonFlyException - Invalid Directive Type
        DragonFlySqlException - Template Datasource errors

      • Template

        public Template(Template from,
                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> seedReplace)

        Template Clone constructor, performs a deep copy of Bookmarks. Directives are shared common objects (read only from construction)

        Parameters:
        from - Template to clone
        seedReplace - Initial replace hash

    • Method Detail

      • wrap

        public static java.lang.String wrap(java.lang.String value)
        Static Helper to wrap a value in the Tag brackets
        Parameters:
        value - The value to wrap
        Returns:
        String (wrappted tag)

      • merge

        public java.lang.String merge()
                       throws DragonFlyException,
                              DragonFlySqlException,
                              java.io.IOException

        Merge Template. This method drives the merge process, processing directives to select data, insert sub-templates, and perform search replace activities.

        Returns:
        The merged template contents, or an empty string if an output file is specified
        Throws:
        DragonFlySqlException - Data Source Errors
        DragonFlyException - Directive Processing Errors
        java.io.IOException - Save Output File errors

      • saveAs

        public void saveAs()
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   DragonFlyException

        Save As. Write the contents to the Zip file

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Zip File writing errors
        DragonFlyException - TAG_OUTPUTFILE not in replace stack

      • packageOutput

        public void packageOutput()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Finalize Creation of ZIP file, should always be called after merge is complete.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - File Save errors

      • insertText

        public void insertText(java.lang.String txt,
                       com.ibm.util.merge.Bookmark bkm)

        InsertText Used to insert sub-templates and update bookmark offsets

        Parameters:
        txt - The text to insert
        bkm - The bookmark at which to insert the text

        public void replaceThis(java.lang.String from,
                        java.lang.String to)

        Replace all occurrences of a string within the template content
        Parameters:
        from - The string to replace
        to - The value to replace with
        Throws:
        DragonFlyException - Replace To contains From value
